response.overview: Drum Corps International presents the all new Essentials Collection- Champions Blu-ray disc. See and hear legendary performances like never before with all new audio remastering to 5.1 surround from the original stereo recordings and video up-conversions to High Definition. This exciting new collection utilizes cutting edge technology to create the definitive highest quality possible from the original source materials.  Featuring: 1973 Santa Clara Vanguard 1975 Madison Scouts 1984 Garfield Cadets 1986 Blue Devils 1989 Santa Clara Vanguard 1991 Star of Indiana 1994 Blue Devils 1996 Phantom Regiment 1999 Blue Devils 2000 Cavaliers 2005 Cadets 2006 Cavaliers 2007 Blue Devils
response.title: DCI Essentials Collection - Champions Volume 1
